response.overview: Jerry the mouse isn’t alone in his battle against the naughty cat Tom. In this collection of crazy adventures, you’ll meet other friends who join our famous duo for countless pranks, mishaps, and laugh-out-loud fun!  Episodes: Downhearted Duckling (O patinho feio) The Dog House (Preso é que é) The Flying Sorceress (A bruxa voadora) The Egg and Jerry (Chocar Problemas) Polka-Dot Puss (Gatinho às pintas) Puppy Tale (Os cachorrinhos) Tom Texano (Texas Tom) Cruise Cat (O gato e os barcos) That's My Mommy (É a minha mamã)
response.title: Espectáculo Tom & Jerry 2: Volume 19
